This could be cached if the block is finalized.  Not sure if its worth the effort though.

Feels odd to be calling ctx.result twice rather than just returning the serialised JSON.  You'd have to make it future.<Object>thenApplyChecked above I believe.
Though the result javadoc does say it overwrites the existing result so I guess it works...
yep it should just return the string. fixed
